head.title: Batida De Abacates (Avocado and Ice Cream Dessert/drink)

ing.item: Chopped Brazil nuts and Maraschino Cherries (optional)

directions.step:
Source : A Taste of Brazil (copyright 1976,1995) By: Mary O Lorensen & Margaret O Gray
Combine avocados and lemon juice and mash. Add sugar and continue mashing until creamy . Add ice cream and beat well with electric beater. Serve at once in beautiful dessert glasses and top with nuts and a cherry.
For Avocado Drink, just add enough milk to get the desired consistency.
(It can be made in the blender)
Serve at once and enjoy! Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by (VJFE02C) M LORENSEN on
